ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I learned a good amount of indonesian that gave me the ability to carry on conversations in the language without much difficulty. I also learned quite a lot of really interesting cultural facts and things about Indonesia.
I learned so much about Indonesian culture and the language in general.
I learned and enjoyed learning a new language, being able to broaden my linguistic and cultural horizons.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: I think the stregnths are Pak Indriyo and Kak Nia, I think the weakness is in the class being so far up science hill
No weaknesses. Indonesian with Pak and Kak Nia is so much fun and easily one of my most favourite classes.

The leniency and fun-going nature of Pak Indriyo made life for a student-athlete engaged in learning a new language. One weakness might be that information wasnt always best communicated over digital means.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Absolutley, Pak Indriyo is a wonderful instructor and has a real passion for the language and culture that shines through.
ABSOLUTELY!! Pak is one of the nicest human beings to ever walk the face of the earth. Class is always so much fun and there is a very supportive environment.
I would, because as someone who has had trouble learning languages in the past, Pak Indriyo did a great job at getting people excited to learn, and giving them good instruction on how to learn it.
